function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Improper management of medical waste potentially infected with contagious diseases during pandemics.","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission to individuals handling the waste and potential exposure to the public.","Mitigation":"Proper segregation, processing, and management of medical waste with safety measures during pandemics.","Technologies":"Incineration, autoclaving, and chemical treatment of medical waste.","People":"Individuals handling medical waste, public exposed to improperly managed waste.","Owner":"Healthcare facilities, waste management companies, government health departments."}]}
